Description:
------------
EA and Warner Bros. have announced the development of two video game Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, whose launch will coincide with the end of the Harry Potter of Warner Bros. Pictures will be divided into two parts.

Available for PS3, Xbox 360, PC, Wii, DS and mobile platforms this fall, Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part I is an action game in the third person that summons us to locate and remove the Horcrux of Voldemort, batiÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©ndonos in combat with both Death Eaters and Snatchers as the worst of creatures from previous movies.

"The final adventure of Harry Potter gives us the opportunity to offer a video game much darker and more action than previous installments. We are creating a Harry Potter video game that we think the HD console generation will appreciate and enjoy. We have created a proprietary technology that allows us to prove that magic is a weapon of great power and, in this title, players will take advantage of all their skills if they want to survive, "says Jonathan Bunney, Vice President and Production Manager EA Bright Light.

For his part David Heyman, producer of the Harry Potter films, said: "We have enjoyed a great partnership with EA working closely with the Harry Potter video game franchise." "Over the years, video games have evolved in the same way that films, both art direction and in its essence, so we find it very exciting to know that Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows 1 - the game capture all the action and suspense of the film. "
